com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth

Interface IdCloudClient


  • public interface IdCloudClient
    An interface that creates the request for all of IdCloud client operations.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Creates a change pin request.

    • Method Detail

      • getActivatedAuthenticators

        List<Authenticator> getActivatedAuthenticators()
        Fetch the activated authenticators for the enrolled credential
        Returns:
        A List of Authenticator instance.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • createEnrollRequest

        @NonNull
EnrollRequest createEnrollRequest(@NonNull
                                           EnrollmentToken enrollmentToken,
                                           @NonNull
                                           UiCallbacks uiCallbacks,
                                           @NonNull
                                           EnrollRequestCallback requestCallback)
        Creates an enrollment request. The request's execution is triggered separately through EnrollRequest.execute().
        Parameters:
        enrollmentToken - Contains the token to initiate enrollment with the IdCloud server.
        uiCallbacks - Group of ui callbacks allowing developers to show the UI during PIN or biometric authentication.
        requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the enrollment operation.
        Returns:
        An EnrollRequest instance.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • createFetchRequest

        @NonNull
FetchRequest createFetchRequest(@NonNull
                                         UiCallbacks uiCallbacks,
                                         @NonNull
                                         FetchRequestCallback requestCallback)
        Creates a fetch request. The request's execution is triggered separately through FetchRequest.execute().
        Parameters:
        uiCallbacks - Group of ui callback allow developers to show the UI during PIN or biometric authentication.
        requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the fetch operation.
        Returns:
        A FetchRequest instance.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • createChangePinRequest

        @NonNull
ChangePinRequest createChangePinRequest(@NonNull
                                                 SecurePinPadUiCallback uiCallback,
                                                 @NonNull
                                                 ChangePinRequestCallback requestCallback)
        Creates a change pin request. The request's execution is triggered separately through ChangePinRequest.execute().
        Parameters:
        uiCallback - UI callback allow developers to show the UI during change PIN operation
        requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the change pin operation.
        Returns:
        A ChangePinRequest instance.
        Since:
        1.1.0

AddAuthenticatorRequest createAddAuthenticatorRequest(@NonNull
                                                               UiCallbacks uiCallbacks,
                                                               @NonNull
                                                               AddAuthenticatorRequestCallback requestCallback)
        Creates an add authenticator request. The request's execution is triggered separately through AddAuthenticatorRequest.execute().
        Parameters:
        uiCallbacks - Group of ui callback allow developers to show the UI during PIN or biometric authentication.
        requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the add authenticator operation.
        Returns:
        A AddAuthenticatorRequest instance.
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • createRemoveAuthenticatorRequest

        @NonNull
RemoveAuthenticatorRequest createRemoveAuthenticatorRequest(@NonNull
                                                                     Authenticator.Type authenticatorType,
                                                                     @NonNull
                                                                     RemoveAuthenticatorRequestCallback requestCallback)
        Creates a remove authenticator request. The request's execution is triggered separately through RemoveAuthenticatorRequest.execute().
        Parameters:
        authenticatorType - The type of the authenticator to be removed.
        requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the remove authenticator operation.
        Returns:
        A RemoveAuthenticatorRequest instance.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • createUnenrollRequest

UnenrollRequest createUnenrollRequest(@NonNull
                                               UnenrollRequestCallback requestCallback)
        Creates an unenrollment request. The request's execution is triggered separately through UnenrollRequest.execute().

        requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the unenrollment operation.
        Returns:
        A UnenrollRequest instance.
        Since:

      • configureSecureLog

        static com.thalesgroup.gemalto.securelog.SecureLog configureSecureLog(@Nullable
                                                                      com.thalesgroup.gemalto.securelog.SecureLogConfig config)
        Sets the secure logger intended to log necessary retrievable information.
        Parameters:
        config - A configuration object of secure log.
        Returns:
        An instance of `SecureLog` or `null` if config set is nil.
        Since:
        2.0.0
